short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring AnythingLLM directly into your browser to curate and collect content on the web directly into your AnythingLLM workspaces.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**This extension requires you to have AnythingLLM**

The AnythingLLM browser companion allows you to seamlessly send and collect information you find in your browser and import or send that data directly into your AnythingLLM workspaces!

Works for both online instances as well as desktop clients >=v1.6.5

The browser companion supports white-labeling as well as customization via our Open-source repo:
Browser: https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anythingllm-extension
AnythingLLM: https://github.com/Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm
AnythingLLM Desktop: https://anythingllm.com/download
